price: И Ми смо спасили њега и оне који су били уз њега у крцатој лађи,
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
